subject: Roads and Traffic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A large transformer fire broke out yesterday on the Grand Central Parkway in Queens, shutting down parts of the highway and snarling traffic for hours as baseball fans headed to the Mets-Yankees game at Shea Stadium.
snippet: A large transformer fire broke out yesterday on the Grand Central Parkway in Queens, shutting down parts of the highway and snarling traffic for hours as baseball fans headed to the Mets-Yankees game at Shea Stadium.
